attributes.action: make the successful completion of a moped or motorcycle test a requirement for a car driving test application.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some of the causes of driving accidents are lack of awareness,intepretation of road conditions and consideration for other road users.
A moped, or motorcycle test, would focus on these aspects of vehicle control, before drivers are in charge of larger vehicles with reduced visibility and greater passenger carrying capacity.
The road skills learned during the moped and motorcycle test are of great benefit to car drivers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
